channel.title: Help With Ham
channel.description: I just downloaded Hamachi and i was wonderin if one of you could help me with it, i dunno what to do to connect to ham servers. lol i think some one might quote me cause this is a stupid question. well at least for me.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 11:12:55 PM[/size][hr]sorry dint read sticky, delete this or lock or somethin

item.title: Help With Ham
item.dc:creator: @Rrie Rrie
item.description:
@Rrie wrote:

Ok. I had same trouble, so what you do is…

Go to bottom-right and find a button that when you click on it, it says (create new network), (join network)

click on join

type in the server name exactly how it is spelled on forums. (for example: ServerScape V1)
copy that exactly how it is spelled (upper-case and everything)

then type in the password. It should be on forums on their post.

A network, or something will come up. Then, search for the I.P adress it gives you on their post.
double click their server (with the I.P adress and all that)

get on moparscape and type in the I.P adress. Then go to the top and click ‘File’
After that, click on Server Port and type in the port.
Again, you can find the I.P adress, Port number, hamachi information on their post.

Hopefully this helped =][br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 07:24:25 AM[/size][hr]lol, spelled address wrong! my bad!

Read full topic
